title: Palm Up Hand
description:
A hand in profile with the palm facing up.

Can be used to represent the action of lifting, offering, demanding, or beckoning. May also be used to express a question or lack of knowledge.

The design is a mirror image of ğŸ«´ Palm Down Hand. The hand position is similar to the one in ğŸ’ Person Tipping Hand.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's palm-up hand emoji is rendered with a gentle, upward curve, its surface subtly reflecting light with characteristic Apple gloss and 3D shading. The handâ€™s skin tone appears natural and warm, with soft, rounded fingers conveying an open and welcoming gesture. On Apple devices, this emoji signifies offering, asking, praying, or a general sense of openness and receptiveness, beautifully captured with Apple's refined visual style.
